Room.Name: Kaldeas' Mansion Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hall that appears to stretch to infinity in both directions.
Room.LongDescription: Far, far to the north is the foyer, which is the main entrance to this place. Not only was Kaldeas interested in illusion, of which he was the leader in that particular field of magic, but he was also a dabbler in mythology.
